thread.section_title: Hotel Wales - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Ambiance, Wonderful Staff
thread.title_full: Wonderful Ambiance, Wonderful Staff - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Charlene N
title: Wonderful Ambiance, Wonderful Staff
text: Excellent location, beautiful part of town within walking distance of the great museums. Had a reservation glitch with my booking service - but Catheryn at the desk made all problems vanish. We enjoyed the comfortable public areas on the second floor, sipping complimentary coffees and teas and enjoying the views.
